abstract: The world’s largest soft-drink maker reported a net income of $1.65 billion in the latest quarter, beating analysts’ estimates.
snippet: The world’s largest soft-drink maker reported a net income of $1.65 billion in the latest quarter, beating analysts’ estimates.
lead_paragraph: The Coca-Cola Company, the world’s largest soft-drink maker, reported fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday that topped analysts’ estimates as teas and juices bolstered sales in Asia.

headline.main: Strong Asian Sales Bolster Coca-Cola in 4th Quarter
headline.print_headline: Strong Asian Sales Bolster Coca-Cola in 4th Quarter
